title: Greek salad with sumac
ingredients: ['4 ripe tomatoes', '1 cucumber', '1 red onion, sliced', '1 teaspoon dried sumac', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced', 'salt', '1 tablespoon finely chopped mint', '1 tablespoon finely chopped parsley', 'pomegranate molasses to drizzle on top (optional)']
